document.title: Arkansas Department of Education Division of Career and Technical Education Agribusiness Management Standards

641C145AD27E462193CA7D9D99A81BC5.description:
Research and summarize the purpose, components and process to develop marketing
plans for AFNR businesses.

692384B6EBD248E6B71C34BECAE223ED.description:
Research and categorize different strategies used in marketing programs for AFNR
businesses (e.g., internet, direct to customer, social media, etc.).

4E0D48C32D2D4084BA36BA95D7E99B5C.description:
Assess and select appropriate alternative marketing strategies (e.g., value-adding,
branding, niche marketing, etc.) for AFNR businesses using established marketing
principles.

82A7D92BB7954512BFB121451E1125B5.description:
Identify and explain marketing principles used in AFNR businesses (e.g., 4 P’s-product,
place, price, promotion; attention, interest, desire, action, etc.).

92CCF061B46A474999D48B00F5F51DFF.description:
Assess marketing principles and develop marketing plans to accomplish AFNR business
objectives.

712848B84DAB48E39FB3334DB617E3BE.description:
Research and summarize examples of different types of sales calls used in AFNR
businesses (e.g., cold calls, face-to-face meetings, follow up calls, etc.).

2BCE42444946408CB5D5D97CD81668F4.description:
Identify and explain components of the sales process for AFNR businesses (e.g.,
understanding needs, develop solutions, close sale, etc.).

34D90788C176416281AFEFBE71F1D23E.description: Assess and apply sales principles and skills to accomplish AFNR business objectives.

D8C2D71AC10445E482E7E2A9B3A79C23.description:
Research and summarize different forms of market competition found in AFNR
businesses (e.g., direct competitors, indirect competitors, replacement competitors,
etc.).

3CA8EF7BADEE4B4689ABB3CEA02350B2.description:
Distinguish and explain markets related to AFNR businesses (e.g., commodity markets,
energy markets, etc.).

2C55CCA505E64EC2BFB67A9F6C9444CB.description:
Analyze the role of markets, trade, competition and price in relation to an AFNR business sales
and marketing plans

22FA0AAE48974594A5BB4697FECD27F7.description: Use sales and marketing principles to accomplish AFNR business objectives.

B826BC025929419A95DC6485CA12818F.description:
Risk management strategies for AFNR businesses (e.g., cash flow projection, analyze
market trends, etc.)

81706C9A10864A57A310604B7BBE3D9D.description:
Assess and classify sources of risk for an AFNR business (e.g., financial risk, public
perception of company, etc.).

006AFD9D60704D10A25BA99327F0C01F.description: Identify and apply strategies to manage and mitigate risk.

8DFB7ABCCB664507BA50D73A61622274.description:
Identify and define the components of operational plans in AFNR businesses (e.g.,
location, supply and inventory management, production and distribution, organization
structure, etc.)

436C6EB78D1B4584BED365AFC27BD01E.description: Develop production and operational plans for an AFNR business.

DC4F97C5FEC24E8C84C4E1057CF0BDF9.description:
Research and describe the components to include in a business plan for an AFNR
business.

304B46784B5C470FA2206E371BF64AAE.description:
Categorize the characteristics of the types of ownership structures used in AFNR
businesses (e.g., sole proprietorship, cooperatives, partnerships and corporations).

649A3FAB0F814C9DA5C1DAA54E44BC3D.description:
Describe the meaning, importance and economic impact of entrepreneurship on the
AFNR industry and larger economy.

11DD2E5F9D544FCB90509ADEFE1B7E83.description:
Analyze characteristics and planning requirements associated with developing business plans for
different types of AFNR businesses.

4635B14250764B528B28F2FEC6DE066A.description: Develop a business plan for an AFNR business.

4364C797AEB342D9A4235999CA132772.description:
Examine and interpret the terms and conditions associated with credit instruments used
in AFNR businesses (e.g., repayment terms, APR, grade periods, personal liability,
interest rates, etc.).

C2ACD599DFFC443E8379280E2E921326.description:
Research and summarize the characteristics of different types of credit instruments
available to AFNR businesses (e.g., lines of credit operating notes, alternative sources
of capital, etc.)

6D014B2454994E7B9BAC5782E99F47D8.description: Analyze credit needs and manage credit budgets to achieve AFNR business goals.

3115610508D44CFC9072510C09A3C341.description:
Research and summarize factors that impact management of cash budgets in AFNR
businesses (e.g., changes in price of inputs/outputs, financial investment performance,
capital purchases, human resources, etc.).

E5C22D1790EF4099BD1903FDA8B8B0AF.description:
Compare and contrast components of cash budgets (e.g., anticipated revenue,
production costs, overhead costs, profit, etc.) and identify the appropriate components
to include in a budget given the nature of the AFNR enterprise.

0FA20C046868407FA7518C0D603B7834.description: Develop, assess and manage cash budgets to achieve AFNR business goals.

248DBEDED8F94448B6B9986C2489A806.description: Manage cash budgets, credit budgets and credit for an AFNR business using generally accepted accounting principles.

A9D6076A939C4748A0AA068492079662.description:
Define and classify different types of taxes that may be paid by AFNR businesses (e.g.,
income, property, sales, employment, estate. Etc.).

E9E2B9575B9043DAABA69881E224AD6A.description:
Prepare and interpret financial reports to describe the performance of AFNR businesses
(e.g., efficiency profitability, net worth, financial ratios, working capital ratio, leverage,
etc.).

FA155CC7F3254187B648D7830D397683.description:
Compare and contrast the different types of financial reports (e.g., income statements,
cash flow statements, equity statements, etc.) and their frequency of use (e.g., daily
weekly, monthly, quarterly, annual) for monitoring AFNR business performance.

74E572D49BAC40AD83BAE522FAE24E22.description:
Assemble, interpret and analyze financial information and reports to monitor AFNR business
performance and support decision-making (e.g., income statements, balance sheets, cash-flow
analysis, inventory reports, break-even analysis, return on investment, taxes, etc.)

75F67C5170CB46F4921E0164230AB354.description:
Research and examine the implications of applicable laws and regulations related to
recording, tracking and auditing AFNR business transactions (e.g., Generally Accepted
Accounting Principles, data security, etc.)

B996C59B121F452E941CC6DDC9A44EA1.description:
Research and summarize the features of different tools and services for recording,
tracking and auditing AFNR business transactions (e.g., electronic tools, paper-based
tools, consultative services, on-line services, banking services, etc.).

37487D4056624488B0DE1AEDED8603CF.description:
Examine and describe accounting systems and procedures used for record keeping in
AFNR businesses (e.g., cash vs. accrual systems, identification of appropriate
accounts, double-entry accounting, entry of debits and credits, etc.)

1D7182DB7EF7462FAA1A4ECBAB96E4CF.description:
Apply fundamental accounting principles, systems, tools and applicable laws and regulations to
record, track and audit AFNR business transactions (e.g., accounts, debits, credits, assets,
liabilities, equity, etc.)

A525D216DF8D4D6E9AD76A45ACE529E6.description: Use record keeping to accomplish AFNR business objectives, manage budgets and comply with laws and regulations.

A6B058FEAFFF41129B5E42E2284A02B8.description:
Research and explain the meaning and functions of human resources in AFNR
businesses (e.g., recruitment, evaluate employee performance, employee record
management, compensation, etc.)

662FDB7EBDC64DE087262E8E52AE4786.description:
Evaluate, develop and implement procedures used to recruit, train and retain productive human
resources for AFNR businesses.

9CE1801D40744AE5A4F856EBE96A4B3F.description:
Identify and evaluate the presence or lack of ethical standards in planning and operating
AFNR businesses.

2B2FF760ED614225A98CC7EF6814E659.description:
Identify and interpret appropriate local, state, federal, international and industry
regulations that impact the management and operation of AFNR businesses.

23DE7F27E0894C8E863B057CEA3D966E.description:
Define and provide examples of management skills used to organize an AFNR business
(e.g., management types, organizational structures, time management techniques,
conducting business agreements, etc.).

43A583AD8BCC4112B3F5DDF18B1A117B.description:
Devise and apply management skills to organize and run an AFNR business in an efficient legal
and ethical manner.

BB9E8A4D307D4712AE8DDE14A30AF46E.description:
Prepare short-term, intermediate and long-term goals and objectives that are consistent
with the statements of purpose for an AFNR business.

FB7D790C6ADD43BCAFBE407E5F77BB5B.description:
Identify the meaning and importance of goals and objectives in AFNR business
enterprises.

98876EB3413647B4A8029E889F8CB520.description:
Read, interpret, evaluate and write statements of purpose to guide business goals, objectives
and resource allocation.

6D519BEAA8574A42AC26A59D2013193B.description:
Analyze and describe the relationship between AFNR business and industry outputs
and domestic and global macroeconomic trends (e.g., Gross Domestic Product, national
income, rate of growth, price levels, etc.)

949FD8AF570A454E80F175F59EFC5348.description:
Examine and provide examples of macroeconomic principles related to AFNR
businesses (e.g., Gross Domestic Product, inflation, capital accounts, unemployment
rate, etc.)

7C3AF27E38BD4352B8613F275BE99E6B.description:
Examine and provide examples of microeconomic principles related to decisions about
AFNR business inputs and outputs (e.g., supply, demand and equilibrium, elasticity,
diminishing returns, opportunity costs. Etc.)

F873CC0D9C484A4F91F2D062E4C72537.description:
Apply micro- and macroeconomic principles to plan and manage inputs and outputs in an AFNR
business.

D24E2B3FE977484988CD0D0B8EF731AF.description: Use record keeping to accomplish AFNR business objectives, manage budgets and comply with laws and regulations.

F396CA9C9BD6493C96EA6ED292C2CB1C.description:
Research ways that AgriBusiness Management or the skills needed may be
implemented as a Supervised Agricultural Experience, and other FFA activities
that might involve AgriBusiness Management.

1D3192BCD2B9479DA1E5FD07F7C0241E.description:
Examine the AgriBusiness Management Career Development Event for
opportunities to exhibit skills needed in AgriBusiness Management.

499D11D744ED492EBC718FC9EBF03966.description:
Evaluate and implement the steps and requirements to pursue a career opportunity in
AgriBusiness Management.

6DB6A355706741C89C7C7E769BE2ED30.description:
Analyze personal skillset and create a plan for obtaining the required education, training
and experiences to obtain a career in AgriBusiness Management.

86F4EF0D65FB44D5A340F627289404BC.description:
Examine the educational, training and experiential requirements to pursue a career in
AgriBusiness Management (e.g., degrees, certifications, training, internships, etc.).

3561D4D3E234457AB68A7ADCB04C8D79.description:
Evaluate and implement the steps and requirements to pursue a career opportunity in
AgriBusiness Management.

A119E65234364D158AE28A73CD116BF9.description: Examine Career and FFA Opportunities associated with Agribusiness Management
